tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am writing this review after a 3 month follow up done. My wife has been suffering from loose teeth and increasing gaps especially in the front teeth since 15 years. Over the period of time, the teeth fell off one after the other. We have consulted at least 3 dentists including Dr Aaditi Mahajan. We decided to go ahead with Dental implants as the treatment explanation was in detail and Dr answered all our queries with a lot of patience. Got 9 implants done in total, 4 upper and 5 in the lower jaw, all done in a single sitting. Process was quick, painless. Treatment charges were reasonable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was in lots of pain on 05/01/2021 around 8 pm ,just searched on Google for near by dentist ,got the contact details of loop dental clinic . I called the number & Dr. Aditi herself was on call & she immediately gave me appointment for visit at 8.30 pm After reaching clinic , I noticed they nare taking all precautions for COVID 19 , thery taking only one patient at a time & Dr. Aditi herself managing all appointments personally. 
Then after diagnosis & X rays it was found that my wisdom tooth is in very had condition & causing all problems . 
On 09/01/2021 she did the surgery to remove my wisdom tooth along with Dr. Shakeel
I guess it was major surgery due to the horizontal position of wisdom tooth but they did it very nicely.

Just want mention , I have not seen any Dr. In my life of  35 yrs . Who is taking care of her patients very personally , calling them personally to know the progress. & Also want to  mention I have not gone there with any refference..just went there randomly still recived treatment more than like family doctor
Also it's very fine with charges.

Definitely it's best place for any dental treatment Please Visit & Get blessed with Best Treatment .

Thanks You
Dr. Aditi
Keep doing  your Nobel work , God Bless You...
reply_text:
Thank you Mr. Suryavanshi for taking the time to leave this detailed feedback and trusting Loop Dental ! You've made our day  :)

We are glad you noticed the things we do for patient care, especially post operative follow-ups !
You have been extremely cooperative and patient during the entire surgery, it made things go smoothly, Thank you :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Went to the Dr, I had many teeth missing,  was embarassed to smile and also eating issues. Dr Aaditi explained all options and decided for implants. Got 6 jmplants done. Initially I was very scared, thinking it will be painful and lot of swelling as I had meetings next day. But everything went smooth and my dental fear went away. Really happy with the final outcome, will recommend to all. Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you for taking time to leave a feedback and trusting Loop Dental. It was a pleasure to treat you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Loop Dental is an ideal place for all your beautiful pearls.    Dr. Aaditi is a thorough professional and knows her craft very well.She did an amazing job in extracting 2 wisdom teeth and a decayed tooth from my 82 year old mom. 

Her assuring presence ensured that my mom had no diffilculty in going through the procedure and her constant follow ups even after the procedure was completed expressed her professionalism truly.

The clinic is new and well maintained and gives you a a very reassuring feeling 

Gordon Rodrigues
Borla Uttam Society
reply_text:
Thank you Mr. Rodrigues for taking the time to leave this detailed feedback.
Rosa aunty has been very brave for handling 2 back to back wisdom tooth surgeries which made our work relatively easier.
She has been a very cooperative patient, it was a pleasure to treat her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
During covid phase 1 lockdown, when it was difficult to find a dentist, at this moment Dr Aditi removed my wisdom tooth adhering all  covid protection and safety protocol. 

I visited her clinic on Friday and got an appointment for Tuesday due to limited timings during lockdown. I was in severe pain and on Friday night, I just pinged Dr Aditi on WhatsApp at 1:30 am just to convey the severity of my pain. Surprisingly Dr called me instantly and asked me to visit her clinic in morning. Got my OPH done on the same day. She opened her clinic at 12:30 pm just for me, usual time was 4:30 pm. Not only she did a brilliant job and should thorough professional while removing the wisdom tooth but she called me everyday for next 4 days to enquire about my pain and to check how well I am responding to the treatment. I can say that you can only get such care an professionalism when you are passionate about your profession. Thank you doctor!
reply_text:
Thank you Mr. Mandal for this detailed Review. You have definitely made our day üôÇ
We are glad you noticed the little things for patient care at Loop Dental, which raised the bar!!

As a Dr, we do give emphasis on post operative care, and our work gets easier when we treat cooperative patients like you üôÇ

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I walked into Dr. Aditi Mahajan‚Äôs dental clinic petrified, and walked out as one satisfied patient. The clean, warm, and comfortable ambience instantly put me at ease. Without any waiting time I was allowed to visit her, and warmly greeted. Once I put forth my concerns, an X-ray was taken followed by a clear explanation of the diagnosis and route of treatment. Got cavities filled, and my entire set of teeth scaled and polished to look as good as new. Besides being a thorough professional, she is patient and gentle ‚Äì just what you need when you‚Äôre a bundle of nerves. Highly recommended!
reply_text:
Thank you Twinkle for taking the time to write a feedback.

Reviews like these make us want to work harder every day! We assure you a delightful experience at Loop Dental, each time. Thank you for your kind wordsüôÇ.Stay healthy, stay safe. Happy Brushing!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Really appreciate the work of Dr. Aaditi. She was really helpful and supportive during the treatment. She suggested proper OPG test before the extraction so she was sure about the things. During consultation she explained everything very politely to us.On the actual work day, my wife was really nervous as she had really bad experience previously with other doctors but this was a miracle experience. Tooth extraction was done in less than 15 minutes without any pain. Dr. Aaditi explained the next steps really well and this helped my wife to take care post procedure.Thank you for all your support and I highly recommend.
reply_text:
Thank you Mr Mathur for trusting Loop with your wife‚Äôs extraction and writing this detailed feedback. 
We love to get the patient onboard with the treatment, glad you noticed it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
@ 63 & a juvenile diabetic with a decaying wisdom tooth was always a cause for concern. Dentists I consulted in the past had only 1 suggestion - to have it extracted. But the anxiety & apprehensions due to my low threshold for pain & post operative healing on account of the diabetes put me off for several years. Till I consulted Loop Dental & Dr. Aaditi Mahajan. Her cool confidence & assurances that she can achieve the impossible put my mind at rest & at last I took the plunge. On 1st October 2021, Dr. Aaditi extracted the painful & decayed wisdom tooth with such ease and expertise that I was amazed! 

Hats off to Dr. Aaditi & her team. I would without hesitation recommend her to family & friends for any of their dental issues. Dr. Aaditi, I truly appreciate your effort. 

- Chris Jude
reply_text:
Thank you for taking the time to leave a feedback and trusting Loop.
We are glad we could help Mr. Jude and meet his expectations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am astonished with service of Dr. Aaditi Mahajan. When i called her for first time, i had toothache. We had not met but she adviced me to inform in case of toothache so that she can prescribe medicine. That really touched me. There is no waiting time. She cares a lot for her patient. She is a good listener and explain each and everything in detail. I visited recently for RCT. I am highly satisfied with service of Dr. Aaditi. I recommend all to take her service without any hesitation. Surely she highly professional *** *** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** ** ****** **** ******* *** ********** ** ******

tags: None
review:
I highly recommend Loop Dental Clinic. Dr. Aaditi not only treats you with utmost care but also explains the entire procedure and the process throughout the treatment. The current situation requires utmost sanitization. Loop Dental clinic is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized before and after every patient is treated. I had a tooth extraction which was executed painlessly and also my recovery was monitored by the clinic through messages.
Nowadays very rarely do you come across such wonderful experience at any clinic. I am happy and really satisfied by the service provided at Loop Dental Clinic. Thank you Dr. Aaditi for this wonderful experience!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
Actually I am having an issue in my teeth from recent past.In night time it used to pain and it made difficult for me to sleep.
At last I thought that it's better to get treatment from dentist.I am residing in chembur and near about to my guest house there is one clinic named LOOP CLINIC. I just went one day and met doctor Mrs Aditi for consulation. 
During that I came to know that my teeth are damaged and I have to undergo root canal treatment.
Then I have undergone treatment and ceramic cap was placed on my teeth.
Treatment is done in a smoothly without any pain to other teeth.
Rates were also very economical.
 Timing for my appointments are made flexible and changed based on our availability. Bills for treatment  generated are authentic.

I would suggest people in near by chembur can visit and get necessary treatment in time.

reply_text:
Thank you soo much for this feedback, you made our day :) 
We are glad to know that you were satisfied with the treatment !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Aaditi is a doctor par excellence. She explains the problem and treatment in detail, gives pros and cons of different treatments and is also very reasonable in terms of fees. After the treatment also, she calls to enquire of the patient's wellbeing and she is always available on call or whatsapp for any help. Her support staff at clinic is also very good.
For any treatment I recommend her. She is a doctor par excellence.
reply_text:
Thank you for taking the time to leave a feedback, you made our day :)
At Loop, we ensure that post operative follow- up is taken care of, we are glad that you acknowledged it üòä

review: I have always feared dentists  since childhood, thanks to my numerous milk tooth extractions. But I had a wonderful experience at LOOP Dental Clinic! Dr. Aaditi is so professional at the same time advises so well. Thank you! Now I flaunt my teeth while smiling.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a feedback, we are glad we could help you :)

review: I had visited the doctor for severe tooth ache, she first cured the pain and suggested Root Canal treatment. She finished the treatment very quickly as per my convenient timings. Doctor really explained me the treatment plan very well. I also got Zirconia crowns fixed, which were fixed at the cheapest rate in the region.Highly recommend this clinic, very genuine treatment at affordable rates
reply_text: Thank u :)
